4-piece.description: Landing a critical hit on an enemy with a Basic Attack, Dodge Counter, or EX Special Attack increases the equipper's ATK by {atk}% for {duration}s. The buff duration for different skills are calculated separately.
Ultimate DMG increases by {ult_dmg}%. Launching an Ultimate increases the equipper's ATK by {atk}% for {duration}s.
Upon entering combat or switching in, its user's ATK increases by {atk}% for {duration}s. This effect can trigger once every {delay}s.
Launching a Chain Attack or Ultimate increases all squad members' DMG by {dmg}% for {duration}s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
When any squad member triggers a Defensive Assist or Evasive Assist, all squad members deal {dmg}% increased DMG, lasting {duration}s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.
Increase the DMG of Basic Attack and Dash Attack by {basic_dash_dmg}%. When any squad member inflicts Freeze or Shatter, this effect increases by an additional {basic_dash_dmg}% for {duration}s.

Whenever any squad member enters the field using a Quick Assist, all squad members gain 1 stack of Astral, up to a maximum of {max_stacks} stacks, and lasting {duration}s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of Astral increases the DMG dealt by the character entering the field using a Quick Assist by {dmg}%. Only one instance of this effect can exist in the same squad.

Upon hitting an enemy with an Aftershock or Dash Attack, if the DMG dealt aligns with the equipper's attribute, the equipper gains 1 stack of a buff effect, at most once per use of a skill. For each stack, the equipper's ATK increases by {atk}%, and CRIT Rate increases by {crit_rate}%. The effect can stack up to {max_stacks} times and lasts for {duration}s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

When Anomaly Mastery exceeds or equals {anomaly_mastery_req} points, the equipper's CRIT DMG increases by {crit_dmg}%. When any squad member applies Freeze or triggers the Shatter effect on an enemy, the equipper's CRIT Rate increases by {crit_rate}%, lasting {duration}s.
